info.author: Richard Sutton
info.description:
This toolkit is a collection of utilities and demos developed by the RLAI group 
which may be useful for anyone trying to learn, teach or use reinforcement 
learning. The tools are suitable for a range of users, from new users who have 
never used RL before, to very experienced users.
info.keywords: Reinforcement Learning, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence
info.name: Reinforcement-Learning-Toolkit
info.html_description: This toolkit is a collection of utilities and demos developed by the RLAI group which may be useful for anyone trying to learn, teach or use reinforcement learning. The tools are suitable for a range of users, from new users who have never used RL before, to very experienced users.
